title: God in Your Gums, Part 1
description:
The Bible teaches that faith gives us the power to move mountains. But in this lesson, Dr. Tony Evans explains that "moving mountains" means more than just rearranging some real estate. Discover the power of the words that come out of us after Godâ€™s truth goes into us.
